謯字的基本解释

謯
jiē
咏。

謯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǔ］
［《集韻》莊助切，去御，莊。］
同“詛1”。
诅咒。
[②]［zhā］
［《集韻》莊加切，平麻，莊。］
见“謯2娽”。

謯字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謯； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1177第31
【唐韻】側加切【集韻】莊加切，?音樝。【說文】謯，娽也。【長箋】義未詳。　又【廣韻】子邪切【集韻】咨邪切，?音嗟。義同。　又【集韻】子余切，音苴。詠也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?側下切，音鮓。謯訝，訶貌。【集韻】同?。　又【集韻】莊助切，阻去聲。同詛。【前漢·孝成許皇后傳】祝謯後宮有身者王美人及鳳等。【師古註】謯，古詛字。　【集韻】作?。

謯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
謯字的起名意思

暂无。

Lie
jiē
Chant.
Lie
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [zǔ]
["Ji Yun" Zhuang helps cut, go to imperial, Zhuang. ]
Same as "Curse 1".
curse.
[②]［zhā］
["Jiyun" Zhuang Jiaqie, Pingma, Zhuang. ]
See "謯2娽".
Lie
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謯; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1177 31
[Tang Yun] Side add cut [Ji Yun] Zhuang add cut, sound haw. [Said the text] Fu, 娽 also. [Long note] The meaning is unclear.　[Guang Yun] Zi Xie Cut [Ji Yun] Consult Xie Cut,? Sound. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Zi co-cut, sound Ju. Yong also.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Cut side down, sound stunned. Surprised, slanderous. 【Ji Yun】Same as?.　[Jiyun] Zhuang helped cut and blocked the sound. The same curse. [Previous Han·Xiaocheng Queen Xu's Biography] I wish Wang Meiren, Feng, etc., who are living in the harem. [Shigu Note] Fu, the ancient curse word.　【Jiyun】make?.
